author: desruisseaux
msg: Consolidation of the tolerance threshold when comparing objects: try to use thresholds having a physical meaning:
- LINEAR_THRESHOLD (1 cm) when comparing the Ellipsoid axis length,
- ANGULAR_THRESHOLD (equivalent to about 1 cm on Earth) when comparing the PrimeMeridian Greenwich longitude,
- A threshold computed in a way that describe an error of about 1 cm on Earth when comparing map projection excentricity.

msg: CMS commit to www by pctony
